title: Short-Intensive Science Leadership Competency Enhancement Program Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course focusing on developing field-applicable scientific leadership competencies by combining MOOCs with face-to-face instruction in smartphone-based limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the latest research trends in science fields with 80% or higher accuracy using MOOC content in a blended learning environment.
Learners can propose at least three scientific approaches to real-world work cases by applying team-based problem-solving methods in face-to-face workshops.
Learners can establish and present an action plan to apply knowledge acquired through blended learning to their own management tasks via project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
